name: Cinnamon Spiced Nuts
preparation: Preheat oven to 300° F. Line a Sheet Pan with a Sheet Pan Liner.
In large bowl, whisk egg white until foamy.
Stir in nuts until coated. Add seasoning and stir to combine. Spread in a single layer on pan. Bake for 25–30 min.
Remove from oven, let cool completely, then break apart.
tips: Egg Free: Replace egg white with 2 tbsp oil.

Nut Free: Preheat oven to 400° F. Drain and rinse 2 cans (14 oz/398 ml each) chickpeas. Coat with 2 tbsp oil. Add seasoning and stir to combine. Spread in a single layer on a lined sheet pan. Bake for 35 min.

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!
